Body: I am working to add custom rom that are available for ios and android,I need to add add custom rom in my android phones, I was using "androios" rom that is featured for both  ios and android, but its not rebooting properly in   micromax funbook p300Can any one please help me, Regarding Custom Roms that have features of both ios and android, to add in micromax funbook p300.
Title: What are the custom roms available in market for android and ios for micromax funbook P 300?
